Html:
Hi Ohan:

    I want to add some new custom marker to track by alvar. Can I do that?

   I'v been worked on this all day, and could not find the way to do this.

You need to use the SampleMarkerCreation program in ALVAR distribution to generate each marker images, and the use them with our MarkerLayout program in /tools/ directory to create the .xml or just them as single marker.

Ohan

Hi Ohan:

   Thanks for your reply.  I have some other things to do these days. And now I return to this.

   I tried to run SampleMarkerCreation in VS 2008. Compiled OK, but it always broke when calling function "multi_marker.PointCloudAdd(idi, marker_side_len, pose);". And also I really dont know how to use this since there is no document told me the steps. Could help me about the document thing?

It's likely you're running the wrong project. I believe marker creation should never need to call multi-marker functions.

Ohan
